commands.name: az network manager connection management-group create
commands.summary: Create a network manager connection on this management group.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection management-group create --connection-name
                                                      --management-group-id
                                                      --network-manager
                                                      [--description]
examples: az network manager connection management-group create --management-group-id "testManagementGroupId" --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection" --network-manager "/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/testGroup/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkManagers/testNm" --description "A sample connection."

commands.name: az network manager connection management-group delete
commands.summary: Delete specified pending connection created by this management group.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection management-group delete --connection-name
                                                      --management-group-id
                                                      [--yes]
examples: az network manager connection management-group delete --management-group-id "testManagementGroupId" --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection"

commands.name: az network manager connection management-group list
commands.summary: List all network manager connections created by this management group.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection management-group list --management-group-id
                                                    [--max-items]
                                                    [--next-token]
                                                    [--skip-token]
                                                    [--top]
examples: az network manager connection management-group list --management-group-id "testManagementGroupId"

commands.name: az network manager connection management-group show
commands.summary: Get a specified connection created by this management group.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection management-group show --connection-name
                                                    --management-group-id
examples: az network manager connection management-group show --management-group-id "testManagementGroupId" --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection"

commands.name: az network manager connection management-group update
commands.summary: Update a network manager connection on this management group.
commands.syntax:
az network manager connection management-group update --connection-name
                                                      --management-group-id
                                                      [--add]
                                                      [--description]
                                                      [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                      [--remove]
                                                      [--set]
examples: az network manager connection management-group update --management-group-id "testManagementGroupId" --connection-name "testNetworkManagerConnection" --description "My Test Network Manager Connection"
